Package recipes.service

Class RecipesService

java.lang.Object
recipes.service.RecipesService
@Service public class RecipesService extends Object
Service class for managing recipes

This class provides methods for finding, creating, updating, and deleting recipes.

    • deleteRecipeById

      public void deleteRecipeById(long id, org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails details)
      Delete recipe by specified id from DB Requires authentication Only recipe author can delete recipe from DB
      Parameters:
      id - - recipe id
      details - - details of authenticated user
      Throws:
      recipes.exception.RecipeNotFoundException - if recipe with specified id doesn't exist
      recipes.exception.UserIsNotAuthorException - if method called not by an author of recipe
